# Education

```{r education, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
edu <- rorcid::orcid_educations("0000-0002-7852-3851")
edu$`0000-0002-7852-3851`$`education-summary` %>%
  detailed_entries(
    what = `role-title`,
    when = glue::glue("{`start-date.year.value`} - {`end-date.year.value`}"),
    with = organization.name,
    where = organization.address.city
  )
```



# Publications

```{r publications}
scholar::get_publications("q40DcqYAAAAJ") %>%
    vitae::detailed_entries(
    what = title,
    when = year,
    with = author,
    where = journal,
    why = cites
  )
```
